li.a: Az Department of Education School Grades

div.p: Grade based on AzMERIT scores and college/career readiness.
We are tuition free public charter schools, offering a rigorous, traditional environment.

div.h2: It is the purpose of the Academy of Tucson to Provide, Prepare and Graduate.

li.span: A faculty of respected, encouraging and caring educators in a safe and supportive learning environment.
Students for a knowledge-based, multicultural global economy.
Students who are educated, responsible future leaders, contributors to society and lifelong learners.
